SELECT VDO_ID , VDO_NM , VIDEO.CON_ID , CONTRACT.CON_NM , FILE_TYPE , DL_CD.DL_CD_NM AS FILE_TYPE_NM , CONCAT(VDO_ID, ".", DL_CD.TXT_VAL1) AS FILE_NAME , IMG_PLAY_TM , PLAY_TM , PLAY_ST_DATE , PLAY_ED_DATE , VIDEO.REMARK , DATE_FORMAT(VIDEO.CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATED_AT , VIDEO.CREATED_BY , DATE_FORMAT(VIDEO.UPDATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS UPDATED_AT , VIDEO.UPDATED_BY FROM BM_VDO_INFO VIDEO LEFT JOIN BM_CON_INFO CONTRACT ON VIDEO.CON_ID = CONTRACT.CON_ID
LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD ON VIDEO.FILE_TYPE = DL_CD.DL_CD
VDO_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR VDO_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR CONTRACT.CON_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR FILE_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
ORDER BY VDO_ID
